seo.title: Anthony's portfolio - Software Dev with +4 years of experience
seo.description: Hire Anthony Pastor to build your dream website or application. Experienced software developer with over 5 years of expertise in creating modern websites using cutting-edge technologies.

home.name: Hey, I am Anthony
home.main_paragraph: Full Stack Software Developer from Montevideo, Uruguay.

work_1.title: Software Developer
work_1.description_1: Collaborated in multinational product design and development teams. Proficient in the JavaScript ecosystem, with extensive experience in React.js and Node.js.
work_1.description_2: Additionally, implemented payment gateway integrations, and integrations with AWS, Firebase, and social media platforms.

work_2.title: Software Developer
work_2.description_1: Contributed to the development of an electronic invoicing system for Paraguay, built with the .NET ecosystem.
work_2.description_2: This full stack role involved implementing continuous integration with Azure Pipelines and client interactions to address questions and resolve issues.

proj_1.description: Led a team to create a blog showcasing the high-quality handicrafts of Uruguay. This portal was commissioned by the Uruguayan government and successfully positioned the website at the top of Google search results.

proj_2.description: Created a brand and landing page for a Uruguayan metallurgy company. Utilizing advanced SEO techniques, successfully positioned the website among the top Google search results, resulting in a 250% increase in client volume.

proj_3.description: Full stack E-commerce project replicating the Tesla store. This project was completed as part of the DevTalles Next.js course.

about.title: About me
about.first_paragraph: My name is Anthony Pastor, but my friends call me Tony. I started programming when I entered university, and since then, I have been developing my skills as a Full Stack developer üë®üèΩ‚Äçüíª.
about.second_paragraph: I have led development teams for websites for the Uruguayan government and participated in multinational companies. Some of my successes include:
